name: Maha Shivaratri
description: A major festival in Hinduism, this festival is a solemn and marks a remembrance of 'overcoming darkness and ignorance' in life and the world.

name: Holi
description: A popular ancient Hindu festival, also known as the 'Festival of Love', the 'Festival of Colours' and the 'Festival of Spring'.

name: Ram Navami
description: A Hindu festival that celebrates the birthday of Rama, the seventh avatar of the deity Vishnu.
